# VoiceFleet

Last updated: 2026-02-16

> VoiceFleet is an AI voice receptionist for small businesses. It answers phone calls 24/7, books appointments, takes messages, captures caller intent, routes urgent calls, and sends instant notifications. Starting at EUR 99/month with a 30-day free trial.

## Pricing

| Plan | Monthly | Annual (save 16%) | Included Minutes | Parallel Calls | Key Features |
|------|---------|-------------------|------------------|----------------|--------------|
| Starter | EUR 99 | EUR 83/mo | 500 | 1 | AI call answering, local number, SMS notifications, 7-day recordings |
| Growth | EUR 299 | EUR 251/mo | 1,000 | 3 | Custom voice, email notifications, calendar integrations, AI schedule, 30-day recordings |
| Pro | EUR 599 | EUR 503/mo | 2,000 | 5 | Multi-location, priority support, 90-day recordings, dedicated account manager |

- Overage: EUR 0.20-0.30 per minute depending on plan
- No setup fees, no contracts, cancel anytime
- 30-day free trial on every plan, cancel anytime
- Argentina pricing available in USD

## Core Features

1. **AI Call Handling** - Natural language conversations, order taking, reservation booking, FAQ answering
2. **24/7 Availability** - Always-on, no overtime, instant response on every call
3. **Calendar Integration** - Google Calendar, Outlook, Calendly, Cal.com, Square Appointments, SimplyBook.me
4. **Booking Integrations** - Mindbody (beta), TheFork (beta), OpenTable (beta), Resy (beta)
5. **SMS & Email Notifications** - Real-time alerts for every call with summaries and action items
6. **Smart Call Routing** - Automatic escalation to staff for urgent matters, VIP rules, voicemail fallback
7. **Multilingual** - English, Spanish, French, German, Italian
8. **Analytics Dashboard** - Call volumes, peak hours, booking trends (Growth & Pro)
9. **AI Schedule** - Configure when AI answers vs forwards to humans (Growth & Pro)
10. **Local Phone Numbers** - Irish (Dublin & regional), US, and Argentina numbers included
11. **Multi-Location Support** - Up to 5 numbers per account (Pro)
12. **Instant Setup** - Go live in under 1 hour, no technical skills required

## Industries Served

- **Dental Practices** - Appointment booking, patient intake, insurance questions, emergency routing
- **Restaurants** - Reservations, takeaway orders, menu questions, opening hours
- **Professional Services** - Client intake, call qualification, appointment scheduling, message taking
- **Home Services** - Emergency dispatch, job details capture, after-hours coverage
- **Gyms & Fitness** - Class bookings, membership enquiries, schedule information
- **Salons & Spas** - Appointment booking, service questions, availability checks
- **Medical Clinics** - Patient scheduling, triage routing, prescription enquiries
- **Property Management** - Maintenance requests, tenant enquiries, emergency routing

## How It Works

1. Sign up and configure your AI receptionist (business name, greeting, call rules)
2. Forward your existing phone number to VoiceFleet
3. AI answers calls 24/7 - books appointments, takes messages, routes urgent calls

Setup takes under 1 hour. No code required.

## Security & Compliance

- GDPR-ready with EU data residency options
- Data stored in EU (Ireland and Frankfurt data centres)
- End-to-end encryption for call data
- SOC 2 Type II compliant infrastructure
- DPA (Data Processing Agreement) available on request
- Call recordings stored with configurable retention (7/30/90 days by plan)

## Competitor Comparison Summary

| Feature | VoiceFleet | Traditional Voicemail | Answering Services | Smith.ai | Ruby |
|---------|------------|----------------------|--------------------|----------|------|
| Starting Price | EUR 99/mo | Free (phone plan) | EUR 200-500+/mo | $292.50/mo (30 calls) | $235/mo (50 min) |
| 24/7 Coverage | Yes | Yes (records only) | Often limited hours | Business hours + AI | Business hours |
| Booking Integration | Yes | No | Rarely | Limited | No |
| Per-Call Fees | No | No | Often yes | Yes | Yes |
| Setup Time | <1 hour | Instant | 1-2 weeks | 1-2 days | 1-2 days |
| EU Data Residency | Yes | Varies | Rarely | No | No |
